name: The Freezing Goddess

quests.name: Rambling On
quests.description:
"The Nether is such an awful place... So what if it's another dimension, it's far too inhospitable to... well... most anything, really. I often wonder why anyone would ever try to live there.

You know, when this dreadful storm started, I saw a fair few of your kin retreat into the Nether before the portals broke down. I wonder what happened to them... Nothing good, most likely.

...

Er... sorry. I'm rambling. Anyways, with this apothecary stand, you won't need to worry about going to the Nether to retrieve blaze rods for your potions, anymore. These brews won't be quite as potent as those made with blaze rods... but I much prefer them."

tasks.longDescription: Obtain an Apothecary Stand; A variant of the brewing stand that doesn't need blaze rods, but can't upgrade potions.

quests.name: Eidolon
quests.description:
"I am Eidolon. Goddess of the Soul and the Spirit.

When one is taken out of this world, I make sure that they pass into the spirit world successfully.

It's an honorable job, in my opinion. Rest assured, all those who you have slain in my name, both undead and living, have found peace in the beyond. I made sure of it.

Thank you.

I suppose we should continue going, now. Why don't you try to create a shadow gem?"

tasks.longDescription: Using the crucible, create a Shadow Gem.

quests.name: Blood Sacrifice
quests.description: "You're doing well to help me. I'm no longer constantly fighting for survival... and I am quite thankful for it. However, er... I'm still not doing all too well. I believe that I will require some proper sacrifices to make up for the lack of people giving worship. If that's... erm... fine with you, of course."

tasks.longDescription: Acquire a goblet, which can hold all sorts of blood to be used in sacrifices.

quests.name: The Crucible
quests.description:
"You've dabbled in alchemy a bit, yes? Well, if you have, I think you'll get the hang of using a crucible rather  quickly.

 Theurgical alchemy is a wonderful little thing, that will let you make all sorts of reagents. Try it out!"

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Crucible; a big pot that can be used in advanced alchemy.

quests.name: The Strength of the Soul
quests.description:
"...We've come a long way together, haven't we?

Had you not showed up... I would have perished in the cold. However... you worked with me, and brought me up to this point.

...Thank you.

For everything.

I... believe that it is time I share with you what the soul can truly achieve."

tasks.longDescription:
"The Soul Enchanter. The most powerful enchanting apparatus there is. I believe it is time you created one.

While it is expensive... it will be worth it. It's time I truly upheld my half of our deal."

quests.name: Introductions
quests.description:
"Hey! Can you hear me? Am I getting through to you?

...

Finally! You have NO idea how long I was trying to contact you. It took me... a while.

I'm gonna try and keep this nice and short, for you. Basically, I'm a goddess. Not one of those prissy light goddesses, though. Moreso... er... a dark god, I suppose. I don't like the connotations of that, but whatever.

...Right. Back on topic. I'm, uh, kinda sorta freezing to death. I rely on worship to sustain myself... and, well, with most of the people down there being dead... I've been seriously starved of worship. So, uh, I wanna make a deal with you. Mutually beneficial. Basically... I can help you survive, in exchange for some worship. Just, like... enough worship to keep me alive. Sound good? Good."

tasks.longDescription: "Alrighty, first thing's first, I'm gonna need an altar. Just make six altar blocks and slap a straw effigy on top, that should work. Probably."

quests.name: The Hard Part
quests.description:
"Oh... we're nearing that point, now. I... I always hate this part. Having to ask this question.

But... I must. Before I explain what comes next, I must tell you that it is perfectly fine to stop here. I'm no longer at death's door, thanks to you. You've saved my life, and I am so very grateful.

But... if you do wish to go forward, despite the frankly barbaric action you must take next... I promise that I'll make it worth your while.

To fuel my power further, and to allow me to grant you a bit of innate magic... I'm going to need a sacrifice.

A human sacrifice. In a world with so few humans left... it feels so wrong to ask this of you. But, I promise, if you do this... just once... I will be able to do so much more for you."

tasks.longDescription: "If we go continue, you will be able to use your chants to transmute pewter into an extremely powerful sigil. If you can form that sigil... we will go so very far together. I promise."

quests.name: You Still Use That?
quests.description:
"Wait... Don't tell me you're still using a regular old crafting table... right?

Oh my. That's sad. Er... no offense... but that sorry hunk of wood isn't gonna cut it. You'll need an upgrade if you wanna get to the really cool stuff you can do with my help."

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Magic Workbench; a variant of the crafting table that allows you to combine magical reagents with the normal crafting grid to make theurgically enhanced items.

quests.name: Basic Baubles
quests.description: "Arcane Gold is quite beautiful, is it not? Well, it's a rather malleable metal, and it's also quite useful in creating some wonderful little magic baubles for you to wear. Why don't you try making some?"

tasks.longDescription: Craft a set of basic baubles.

quests.name: Far From Useless
quests.description:
"Okay, so... you're probably wondering what the deal with the lead is."

I swear, it's important. Have you ever heard of pewter?

basically, it's a really theurgically important alloy... but you can only really make it by combining lead and iron ingots. If we're going to get anywhere together, you're going to need to make some pewter. Alright?"

tasks.longDescription: Create eight pewter ingots.

quests.name: An Arcane Rush
quests.description:
"Gold is quite magical, you know. It's practically the perfect material for holding magic and enchantments. But... It can most certainly be made better.

With a little bit of alchemy, and a couple soul gems, you can make that gold into something truly magical. Arcane Gold. Isn't that exciting?"

tasks.longDescription: Create two ingots of arcane gold in a crucible.

quests.name: Cold Feet
quests.description:
"The world is... awfully chilly, you know.

You've been bundling up alright, but... I believe I may have something that will suit you quite well.

Try and use that shadow gem to make some magical weaves. If you do things right, you'll be able to create some rather cozy clothes, that also infer a few useful magical boons."

tasks.longDescription: Using Wicked Weave, craft all three pieces of Warlock's attire. While only about half as warm as wool, these pieces provide much more defense and are much more durable, in addition to their innate magical properties.

quests.name: Transmutation
quests.description:
"Hm. I believe I should begin... erm... bestowing some of my power upon you.

If you were to crush a few soul shards and recite a simple incantation, transmuting the resulting dust into various metals and crystals should be quite easy."

tasks.longDescription: "Go on, then. Try it out. You'll need to use your symbol in order to do it, but as long as you have it on your person, you should be perfectly fine."

quests.name: Fiery Summoning
quests.description:
"Oh, this is all so very exciting! Now that we've come this far, I have so many more ways to assist you!

Why don't we attempt some summoning? Those fiery foes of yours very much hate the Chilled... arguably much more than they hate you.

With that symbol of yours, and the right resources, you could create a few entities that you could perhaps turn against the Chilled."

tasks.longDescription: "Alright... I shall need naught but a small soul gem and some blaze powder in order for us to do this."

quests.name: Skull Seeking
quests.description:
"Hm. I knew there was something that I was forgetting about.

My apologies, I should have told you about the axe of cleaving much, much earlier.

Erm... well... Let us keep this short. It can, well, cleave an undead's head right off its body. If you're looking for skulls, it would undoubtedly be useful."

tasks.longDescription: Craft an Axe of Cleaving.

quests.name: Alchemical Reagents
quests.description:
"Hm. Looking at what you have access to at the moment... I'm not seeing all too much.

You're going to need some proper reagents to start brewing."

tasks.longDescription: Create four different reagents in the crucible.

quests.name: A Chilling Ward
quests.description:
"Those Chilled are awfully relentless. They seem to travel great distances in search of warmth to snuff out... in search of you.

I fear that they may arrive in hordes too large to fight, and I fear that you will not have a means of keeping them away.

I believe you require enchanted ash in order to stay safe. They will not be able to cross any lines of enchanted ash that you draw."

tasks.longDescription: Obtain four enchanted ash; powerful dust that prevents undead from crossing it.

quests.name: The Big Reveal
quests.description:
"Something has just occured to me.

After all you've done for me... you still don't know who I am. I never once thought to give you my name.

I believe I should change that."

tasks.longDescription: "Use the symbol, and create my scythe. I will explain then."

quests.name: Shining Souls
quests.description:
"Okay. So, now that you've got pewter, there's something else that you'll need if you wanna move forward with this.

You're gonna need to get your hands on some soul shards. Luckily for you, you're able to craft a brazier with that pewter of yours. The Ars Ecclesia will tell you where to go from there."

tasks.longDescription: Acquire some soul shards; the crystallized souls of slain undead.

quests.name: A Major Error
quests.description:
"Alright! That should be good. Now you just have to perform the proper chants-

Wait. Do you... know the chants?

...Whoops. I may have forgotten the single most important step. And, I can't even teach you the chants, with how weak I am right now. Greeeaaaat.

Okay, here's the deal. You're gonna need to find a witch. Either that, or a potion of some sort, so I can summon a witch for you. It'll take a lot outta me... so you better keep your half of the deal, got it?"

tasks.longDescription: "Alright. Just send me a potion and I can summon something in for you. Once she's there, just toss her the Ars Ecclesia and she`ll fill it out for you, okay?"

description: When you made that book... you heard a voice. You could only barely make it out... but it was offering something. A deal, of sorts.
